Material used.Description: Assessed binding affinity of SNCA variants to lipid vesicles.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P variant exhibited significantly reduced binding to lipid vesicles compared to wild-type.
A53T variant showed no significant difference in binding affinity compared to wild-type.
Double mutant A30P/A53T displayed binding defects similar to the A30P single variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA protein used as a control for binding assays.

Basic negative control.Description: Unlabeled lipid vesicles used as a control for non-specific binding.

Validation controls P/LP.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Binding affinity within 10% of wild-type baseline

Material used.Description: Measured secondary structure changes in SNCA variants.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P variant showed significant deviation in CD spectra compared to wild-type.
A53T variant exhibited CD spectra indistinguishable from wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA protein used as a control for secondary structure analysis.

Basic negative control.Description: Buffer solutions used as a control for background signal.

Validation controls P/LP.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: CD spectra within 5% deviation from wild-type baseline

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: CD spectra > 15% deviation from wild-type baseline

Material used.Description: Analyzed structural organization of SNCA variants.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P variant showed disrupted diffraction patterns compared to wild-type.
A53T variant exhibited diffraction patterns indistinguishable from wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA protein used as a control for structural analysis.

Basic negative control.Description: Amorphous silica used as a control for background signal.

Validation controls P/LP.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Diffraction patterns within 10% deviation from wild-type baseline

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Diffraction patterns > 20% deviation from wild-type baseline
